languages.text: "И мягкость, живущую в нем. Многие, что должны были уйти ко мне, остались жить по воле твоего сердца. Но я не сержусь, ибо все они все равно придут ко мне".
"And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."
languages.original_text: "И мягкость, живущую в нем. Многие, что должны были уйти ко мне, остались жить по воле твоего сердца. Но я не сержусь, ибо все они все равно придут ко мне".

traits.locale_text: "And the softness that dwells in it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive because such was your heart's desire. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."
"And the softness that dwells in it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive because such was your heart's desire. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."
"And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."
"And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."
"And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."
"And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."

languages.text: "Und die Sanftheit, die darin wohnt. Viele, die zu mir übergehen sollten, sind am Leben geblieben, weil Euer Herz es wünschte. Doch ich bin nicht erzürnt, denn letztlich werden sie doch zu mir übergehen."
languages.original_text: "And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."

traits.locale_text: "Und die Sanftheit, die darin wohnt. Viele, die zu mir übergehen sollten, sind am Leben geblieben, weil Euer Herz es wünschte. Doch ich bin nicht erzürnt, denn letztlich werden sie doch zu mir übergehen."

languages.text: «Y conozco la indulgencia que alberga. Muchos que debían haber sido enviados a mí aún viven porque tu corazón lo decidió. Pero no estoy furioso, porque su hora llegará de todos modos».
languages.original_text: "And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."

traits.locale_text: «Y conozco la indulgencia que alberga. Muchos que debían haber sido enviados a mí aún viven porque tu corazón lo decidió. Pero no estoy furioso, porque su hora llegará de todos modos».

languages.text: 「そして、その中に宿る柔らかさを。我がもとに来るはずだった多くの者が、お前の心が望むままに生きながらえた。だが、私は起こりはしない、彼らはいずれ、我がもとに来るのだから」
languages.original_text: "And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、その中に宿る柔らかさを。我がもとに来るはずだった多くの者が、お前の心が望むままに生きながらえた。だが、私は起こりはしない、彼らはいずれ、我がもとに来るのだから」

languages.text: “我也见过你心灵中的柔软之处。由于你的意愿，许多本该回到我身边的人依然活在世上。然而，我并不恼火，因为到了最后，他们一定会回到我身边。”
languages.original_text: "And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."

traits.locale_text: “我也见过你心灵中的柔软之处。由于你的意愿，许多本该回到我身边的人依然活在世上。然而，我并不恼火，因为到了最后，他们一定会回到我身边。”

languages.text: « Et la douceur qui l'habite. {mf|Influencé|Influencée} par ton cœur, tu as laissé vivre nombre de ceux qui devaient me rejoindre. Mais je n'en suis pas fâché, car tôt ou tard, ils seront rattrapés par leur destin. »
languages.original_text: "And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."

traits.locale_text: « Et la douceur qui l'habite. {mf|Influencé|Influencée} par ton cœur, tu as laissé vivre nombre de ceux qui devaient me rejoindre. Mais je n'en suis pas fâché, car tôt ou tard, ils seront rattrapés par leur destin. »

languages.text: "İçinde yaşayan uysallığı da biliyorum. Bana teslim olarak nihayete erme vakti gelen niceleri, yüreğinin arzuladığı üzere yaşamla ayrı düşmediler. Lakin öfkeli değilim. Zira en nihayetinde bana teslim olacaklar."
languages.original_text: "And the softness that dwells within it. Many who were due to pass on to me remained alive as your heart willed. But I am not angered, for they will pass on to me in the end."
